intro: Erlangea, commonly known as the velvetleaf, is a tropical plant belonging to the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its large, heart-shaped leaves that are covered in fine, velvety hairs. The plant produces showy, yellow flowers that are typically clustered in inflorescences. Its fruits are capsules that contain numerous small, round seeds. Erlangea is often found in disturbed habitats and can become invasive in certain regions.
